duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead an inbound and outbound operation at the Distribution Center, overseeing the activities of warehouse workers and ensuring compliance with safety programs and OSHA regulations.
Develop, engage, and supervise a team of frontline supervisors and hourly associates, providing mentoring, training, and career progression guidance.
Identify and lead process improvement initiatives, review productivity requirements, and evaluate performance objectives and metrics to assess productivity requirements.
Monitor staffing levels, communicate procedures with associates and management, and enforce company policies while counseling associates in work-related activities and career development.
Lead and monitor the development strategy for all direct salary reports, and ensure accurate loading of stock into delivery vehicles with necessary documents.
Prepare reports for the Distribution Center Director.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business or equivalent (Master's preferred)
Intermediate to advanced user knowledge of Microsoft, including database, spreadsheet, and Warehouse Management Systems
